projects-card.title: Title

banner-content.openTechnologies: an open technologies robot for education.

c2a2.description: Let's start your journey with us, build your own application using blocks or native Python code.

card-fossbot.fossbot: FOSSBot is an open source and open design DIY robot that has been developed by Greek Free and Open Source Software (GFOSS) and Harokopio University of Athens (HUA) for educational purposes. The robot does not come alone, but comprises multiple software and system solutions that provide a holistic approach for STEM education at all educational levels.

hua-banner.haorkopioUniversityDescription: Harokopio University of Athens is a public university dedicated to promoting research and learning in a small, well focused set of intellectual areas. The university, situated in the centre of Athens and close to the Unesco World Heritage Centre of the Acropolis, originates from an educational institution that was first established in 1929 and gained the status of University in 1990. It takes its name from the national benefactor Panagis Harokopos. The University/’s excellent campus facilities houses four academic departments, the central administration, the library, the IT centre and student advisory services. Harokopio University of Athens is located close to many important cultural sites of interest such as the Acropolis Museum, Thissio, Panathenaic Stadium (Kallimarmaron), Keramikos and the Benaki Museum.

blocklyBlocks.moveDistanceTooltip:
Moves to input direction (default == forward) a specified - input distance (cm).
Param: dist: the distance to be moved (in cm). direction: the direction to be moved towards.
blocklyBlocks.justMoveTooltip:
Moves forwards/backwords
Param: direction: the direction to be headed to.
blocklyBlocks.sleepTooltip:
Sleeps for an amount of time.
Param: time_s: the time (seconds) of sleep.
blocklyBlocks.justRotateTooltip:
Rotates fossbot towards the specified direction id.
Param: dir_id: the direction id to rotate to:
- counterclockwise: dir_id == 0
- clockwise: dir_id == 1
blocklyBlocks.rotate9DegreesTooltip:
Rotates fossbot 90 degrees towards the specified direction id.
Param: dir_id: the direction id to rotate 90 degrees:
- counterclockwise: dir_id == 0
- clockwise: dir_id == 1
blocklyBlocks.playSoundTooltip:
Plays mp3 file specified by input audio_path.
Param: audio_path: the path to the mp3 file to be played.
blocklyBlocks.distanceTooltip: Returns distance of nearest obstacle in cm.
blocklyBlocks.getAccelerationTooltip:
Gets acceleration of specified axis.
Param: axis: the axis to get the acceleration from.
Returns: the acceleration of specified axis.
blocklyBlocks.getGyroscopeTooltip:
Gets gyroscope of specified axis.
Param: axis: the axis to get the gyroscope from.
Returns: the gyroscope of specified axis.
blocklyBlocks.setColorTooltip:
Sets led to input color.
Param: color: the wanted color.
blocklyBlocks.lightSensorTooltip: Returns the reading of the light sensor.
blocklyBlocks.noiseDetectionTooltip: Returns True only if noise is detected.
